name: The Story of little Fishi
description:
Dive into the books and enjoy the story of a fish who lost his friends

Fulfill your own childhood dream of diving into a book and actually play the story.

WASD - Move around

-> The yellow fish will always try to be in the center of the screen <-

Sure, the control is a little bit wobbly, but try catching a fish in real life, thats not easier either

This game was created for the 48th  Ludum Dare Game Jam with the Theme

Deeper and deeper

Marco Schneider

Philipp Rapp (https://philippr95.artstation.com/)
